author: Staff Reporter
text:
Professor Virender Singh, a close aide of former Haryana Chief Minister Bhupinder Singh Hooda, was booked on sedition charges on Wednesday for an audio clip of his conversation in which he had allegedly incited violence during the Jat reservation agitation.

The alleged clip featuring the voices of Mr. Singh and Captain Man Singh Dalal, spokesperson of Dalal Khap Chaurasi, surfaced on Monday after the Jat agitation turned violent. Though Mr. Singh conceded that the voice in the clip was his, he maintained that it was doctored.
title: Hooda’s aide charged
